title: doc: "Set up your work environment" section of "Getting Started" is poorly written
body:
by **mdbrown@google.com**: 
http://golang.org/doc/install#gopath says:

   You're almost done. You just need to do a little more setup.

   How to Write Go Code Learn how to set up and use the Go tools

   The How to Write Go Code document provides essential setup instructions for using the Go tools.

The second sentence is poorly written and the third sentence repeats the same link as
the second sentence.
